SEARCH
Package managers

Class BombManager

java.lang.Object
managers.BombManager
public class BombManager extends Object
The BombManager class manages all the bombs in the game. It keeps track of the bombs, updates their states, and renders them on the screen. It also manages the explosions caused by the bombs. The class uses the singleton pattern to ensure only one instance is created.

    • updateBombs

      public void updateBombs(int elapsed)
      Updates the bombs based on the elapsed time. Removes dead bombs and updates the collision checker.
      Parameters:
      elapsed - The time elapsed since the last update.
